description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: the jumping of the clowns in Rottweil is one of the oldest and best known carninval customs; of the 19 town councillors in a small town, 8 are members of the armed services; Germany's first mobile mammography ward used for preventive examinations for cancer; 37 churches and chapels attract tourists to Passau; World toy Fair in Nuremberg; six-day cycle race in Bremen.
